org.usfirst.frc2084.vision

Class Target

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc2084.vision.Target

  • public class Target
extends java.lang.Object
    An object that represents a potential target. It runs a number of tests to determine if it could possibly be a goal and how well it matches.
    Author:
    Ben Wolsieffer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static double HOT_TARGET_ASPECT_RATIO
      The ideal aspect ratio for the hot (horizontal) target.
      static double MIN_AREA
      The minimum area that the bounding rectangle of a blob can have for it to be considered a goal.
      static double MIN_ASPECT_RATIO_SCORE
      The minimum aspect ratio score a blob can have to be considered a target.
      static double MIN_RECTANGULARITY_SCORE
      The minimum rectangularity score a blob can have to be considered a target.
      static double STATIC_TARGET_ASPECT_RATIO
      The ideal aspect ratio for the static (vertical) target.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Target(java.awt.Polygon p)
      Creates a new possible target based on the specified blob and calculates its score.

    • Field Detail

      • STATIC_TARGET_ASPECT_RATIO

        public static final double STATIC_TARGET_ASPECT_RATIO
        The ideal aspect ratio for the static (vertical) target.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HOT_TARGET_ASPECT_RATIO

        public static final double HOT_TARGET_ASPECT_RATIO
        The ideal aspect ratio for the hot (horizontal) target.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MIN_AREA

        public static double MIN_AREA
        The minimum area that the bounding rectangle of a blob can have for it to be considered a goal. We found that certain values would work when the targets were nearby, but when the robot was a the starting position, the goal would appear to be too small and get filtered out.

      • MIN_RECTANGULARITY_SCORE

        public static double MIN_RECTANGULARITY_SCORE
        The minimum rectangularity score a blob can have to be considered a target.

      • MIN_ASPECT_RATIO_SCORE

        public static double MIN_ASPECT_RATIO_SCORE
        The minimum aspect ratio score a blob can have to be considered a target.

        p - the shape of the possible target
